statements: SELECT user_id, date, steps FROM UserActivity;
SELECT calories_burned, distance, steps FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(steps) AS total_steps FROM UserActivity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(distance) AS average_distance FROM UserActivity GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(distance) > 2.5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(steps) AS total_steps FROM UserActivity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_steps DESC
SELECT user_id, date, steps FROM UserActivity WHERE steps > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(calories_burned) AS avg_calories FROM UserActivity WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT user_id, steps, distance FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id, steps DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(distance) AS max_distance FROM UserActivity GROUP BY user_id HAVING max_distance > 10
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM activity_data WHERE steps > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'female';
SELECT data_id, user_id, date, heart_rate FROM activity_data WHERE heart_rate > 120;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM users INNER JOIN activity_data ON users.user_id = activity_data.user_id WHERE steps > 10000 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC, username ASC;
SELECT user_id, steps FROM activity_data WHERE heart_rate > 120 ORDER BY steps DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%' AND age < 40;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, duration_minutes, calories_burned FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, calories_burned FROM user_activity ORDER BY calories_burned DESC;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT user_id, date, hours_slept FROM sleep_data WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, duration_minutes FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Running' ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT user_id, date, hours_slept, quality_rating FROM sleep_data WHERE quality_rating >= 4 ORDER BY hours_slept ASC;
SELECT AVG(hours_slept) as avg_hours_slept FROM sleep_data WHERE user_id = 2 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, TIMESTAMP FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT full_name, age, weight FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, date, steps FROM activity_data WHERE distance >= 5.0 ORDER BY steps DESC;
SELECT user_id, date, resting_heart_rate, avg_heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, date, hours_slept FROM sleep_data WHERE hours_slept BETWEEN 6.0 AND 8.0 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT full_name, age, weight FROM user_profile WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM activity_data WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT user_id, resting_heart_rate, max_heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, hours_slept, sleep_quality FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_quality > 7 AND date BETWEEN '2022-03-10' AND '2022-03-15';
SELECT user_id, full_name, height, weight FROM user_profile INNER JOIN activity_data ON user_profile.user_id = activity_data.user_id WHERE activity_data.steps > 10000;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, metric_name, date FROM health_metrics ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT activity_type, duration, calories_burned FROM activity_logs WHERE calories_burned > 100;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, age, height FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30
SELECT user_id, activity_type, duration, calories_burned FROM activity_logs WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY calories_burned DESC
SELECT user_id, date, heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT user_id, quality, duration FROM sleep_data WHERE quality = 'good' AND duration > 7
SELECT user_id, metric_name, value, date FROM health_metrics WHERE metric_name IN ('weight', 'height') ORDER BY date
